meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Samuell Farm
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department Target Range Program reimbursable grant that provides a funding amount not to exceed $250,000.00 for the design of an archery range for Samuell Farm.

agenda_items.title: Tipton Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the existing pavilion demolition, new pavilion installation and new sidewalk installation with webuildfun, Inc. through the Texas Association of School Boards (BuyBoard) for the Tipton Park Pavilion Replacement located at 3607 Magdeline Street.

agenda_items.title: Five Mile Creek Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize an Advance Funding Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) for design and construction of the Five Mile Creek Trail.

agenda_items.title: Five Mile Creek Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize an Advance Funding Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation for design and construction of the Five Mile Creek Trail.

agenda_items.title: Glendale Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Glendale Park Phase I Improvements Project.

agenda_items.title: West Trinity Heights Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the rescission of the authorization of a public hearing and a public hearing to be held on March 26, 2025.

agenda_items.title: Roland G. Parrish Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Roland G. Parrish Park Improvements Project.

agenda_items.title: Hillcrest Village
agenda_items.description: Authorize a six-month service contract to purchase and install Synthetic/Artificial Turf and Sand Infill at Hillcrest Village.

agenda_items.title: Timberglen Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize the acceptance of a grant from the United States Department of Transportation for the Congestion Mitigation & Air Quality Program.

financial_items.description: Funding for the design of an archery range for Samuell Farm.

Funding for Five Mile Creek Trail design and construction.
